note.p: American surgeon and murderer. MD, Yale University, 1863. Assistant and demonstrator in anatomy at Yale, 1862–4. Translated and reviewed German works on natural history. Sent to England to recuperate after a breakdown, 1871. Murdered George Merrett in Lambeth in 1872, and was confined to Broadmoor Asylum. Supplied thousands of quotations for the OED. Deported to the United States, 1910.
